about_the_game:
Story

A girl from a provincial architecture college dreams of winning a prestigious competition. But everything seems to be against her: hostile competitors, disagreements inside her team, and secrets hidden within the walls of the Architecture Academy. She must uncover the long-forgotten disappearance of a student or risk repeating her fate.

Immerse yourself in the world of intrigue and art scandals with Arts&Hearts Academy. You'll shiver but beg for more!

Features

• Fall in love with one of the 3 unique companions

• Uncover the secrets of the Academy's inhabitants

• Dive into the world of restorers and architects

• Unlock different endings

• Dress up the main character as you like!

• Experience the aesthetics of the Dark Academy

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS version 10.13.4 or 10.14.1 or 10.15.4 or newer
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Intel
  • Graphics: An OpenGL supported GPU
  • Additional Notes: MacBook Pro: from mid 2009 MacBook Air: from mid 2012 iMac: from late 2009 Mac Pro: from late 2008 Mac mini: from 2009

name: Arts & Hearts Academy Demo
short_description: Love, art, and crime at Arts&Hearts Academy! A student girl dreams of winning a prestigious architecture competition and finding friends. She doesn't know yet that an elusive criminal has already set his traps around her.
